attributes.action: MPS & HOUSE OF LORDS PAY TAX ON WAGES & PRIVATE INCOME
attributes.additional_details:
MPS & HOUSE OF LORDS PAY TAX ON WAGES & PRIVATE INCOME

MPS & HOUSE OF LORDS DONT PAY TAXES ON INCOME OR THERE PRIVATE BUSINESS -

THEY SHOULD PAY TAXES JUST LIKE ANY SMALL MEDIUM OR LARGE BUSINESS & NORMAL TAXES LIKE OTHER EMPLOYEES -

ITS A SHAME GOVERNMENT WAS EXEMPT FROM TAXES FOR ALL THESE YEARS.
